I know this has been here before but this can easily exploited by holding normal shears or even a multi tool in your off hand and then using a normal Wind staff.
It would probably be better to check if a wind staff is held in any of the two hands, you can use isItem(...) for this.
Why... I told you to just use isItem(...)
Also: Why did you add this? It doesn't make any sense to add that here
but when testing I found that this causes the player to lose 4 hunger instead of 2 because the multi tool is no longer caught.

Now you changed the logic of this...
removeItemCharge needs to be in a seperate if, otherwise the mode-changing else block will run if you are out of energy.
